"Its time to create your custom PIN. Take your time, because you cant change it later. Your custom PIN is associated with BBM as long as your subscription is active.
Guidelines: * Must be 6 to 8 characters * Can include numbers, letters, underscores, dashes * Must include one underscore, dash, or a letter between G to Z"
You can let your contacts know that you just got the custom PIN: %1$s
I just got a new custom PIN on BBM: %1$s. To customize your PIN, tap http://shop.bbm.com/item/custom_pin

BBM Custom PIN Guidelines

A custom PIN is a fun way to personalize your BBM account. A custom PIN does not replace your current PIN (see \"What is a PIN?\" in the FAQ section of www.bbm.com for more information about regular PINs), but is a second PIN that is displayed in your BBM profile and can be used to invite, and to receive invitations from, other BBM users.

The following are a few things to keep in mind when creating a custom PIN:

• You cannot claim a custom PIN that is being used by someone else.

• If your subscription is not renewed prior to expiring, you will no longer have use of the custom PIN and it may be claimed by another subscriber.

• Choose your custom PIN carefully. Once your custom PIN has been created it cannot be changed during the term of your subscription.

• So that your custom PIN is distinguishable from a standard BBM PIN, custom PINS must adhere to the following requirements:

- must be 6 to 8 characters;

- can include numbers, letters, underscores, dashes;

- must include one underscore, dash, or a letter between G to Z;

• Custom PINs must not include abusive, defamatory, libelous, obscene, profane, illegal or deceptive language, or be used for any illegal purpose.

• Custom PINs may not be used to impersonate another individual, brand, organization or event, or to otherwise mislead, confuse or deceive others.

• Custom PINs must not infringe upon or violate the rights, including intellectual property rights, of any individual, brand, organization or event. For example, your custom PIN may not violate the trademark rights of another person or entity.

• BlackBerry reserves the right to reject, remove and/or reclaim any custom PIN at any time for any reason, subject to any applicable purchase terms/refund policy.
In order to keep your current custom PIN, you might need to buy a new subscription and then cancel your old subscription. For more info, visit: %1$s

There are Contacts and then there are BBM Contacts.

Contacts are people in your deviceâ€™s contacts who are using BBM.

• Chat with Contacts right away
• No invite required

BBM Contacts require an invite. Only BBM Contacts can do the following:

• See your BBM display picture
• See your BBM status updates
• Make or receive calls using BBM Voice
There are Contacts and then there are BBM Contacts.

This is a chat with a Contact. This person canâ€™t see the following:

• Your BBM display picture
• Your BBM status updates
This person must be using the latest version of BBM to chat. You can add this person to your BBM Contacts, or block them at any time.
There are Contacts and then there are BBM Contacts.

BBM Contacts require an invite, and can do the following:

• See your BBM Display picture, status updates, and profile
• Call you using BBM Voice
• Send you broadcast messages

Contacts are people in your deviceâ€™s contacts who are using BBM. With Contacts, no invite is required if they are using the latest version of BBM, and you can still enjoy BBMâ€™s chat features, including:

• D and R notifications on messages
• Sending pictures and files
• Sharing your location with Glympse

"BBM Protected adds an extra layer of encryption to your BBM chats, file transfers, and groups. The next time you start a chat with a BBM Protected contact, you specify a passphrase that the other person must enter to join. You only need to specify a passphrase once for each BBM Protected contact.
For BBM Groups, you can choose whether to restrict membership to BBM Protected contacts or not. If you create a BBM Protected group, you can share the passphrase that people must enter to join."
